text: 1:4 2 Korin 7:4; 7:14; 1 Tesalonika 2:19; Akar Mogomem 1:9Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e tintinibar Godɨn siosbar ghuegha ian ziaba fe. E arazir kurar apaniba ia gamiba bar dar gun me mɨgɨava, osɨmtɨziba sara me mɨgei. Egha e kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Godɨn gumazamiziba me uan nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tugha gavgavigha, osɨmtɨziba ko mɨzaziba ateri.”
